perturbation.original_text: The Customizations shall fulfill or exceed all of the functional, performance and other specifications described in the Program Materials and the documents prepared either by Bank of America or Supplier pursuant to this Agreement. as indicated below.
perturbation.changed_text: The Customizations shall generally align with the functional, performance and other specifications described in the Program Materials and the documents prepared either by Bank of America or Supplier pursuant to this Agreement. as indicated below.
perturbation.explanation: By replacing 'fulfill or exceed all' with 'generally align with,' the contractual obligation becomes vague and unenforceable. This introduces ambiguity because 'generally align' lacks a clear, objective standard for compliance, contradicting the original intent of strict adherence to specifications. It undermines the certainty required for contract enforcement under general contract law principles.
perturbation.contradicted_law: General Contract Law - Requirements for Offer and Acceptance

perturbation.original_text: Fees for Customizations: [SPECIFY TIME AND MATERIALS RATES ([Indicate any “not to exceed” limit on T&M Customization costs) OR FIXED PRICE] If the proposed price Is Increased by Supplier upon delivery to Bank of America of detailed specifications or at any other time hereafter, Bank of America may terminate this Schedule and shall receive a refund of all amounts previously paid hereunder.
perturbation.changed_text: Fees for Customizations: [SPECIFY TIME AND MATERIALS RATES ([Indicate any “not to exceed” limit on T&M Customization costs) OR FIXED PRICE] If the proposed price Is Increased by Supplier upon delivery to Bank of America of detailed specifications or at any other time hereafter, Bank of America may, at the Supplier's discretion, terminate this Schedule and potentially receive a refund of some amounts previously paid hereunder.
perturbation.explanation: This change contradicts the original clause by making the termination and refund process discretionary and depending on the 'Supplier's discretion,' which goes against fundamental principles of contract law where termination rights and refunds should be clearly defined and exercisable by the injured party (Bank of America in this case).
perturbation.contradicted_law: General Contract Law - Breach of Contract Remedies

perturbation.original_text: Unless otherwise specified herein, the environment for this Customization Is the same as described on Product License Schedule A to this Agreement.
perturbation.changed_text: The environment for this Customization will be determined on a case-by-case basis.
perturbation.explanation: By replacing a reference to a defined environment on Product License Schedule A with 'determined on a case-by-case basis,' it creates ambiguity and removes the clear definition. It undermines contract certainty.
perturbation.contradicted_law: General Contract Law - Requirements for Definiteness of Terms
